<h4 id="datadiskresponse">Data<wbr>Disk<wbr>Response</h4>



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="createoption_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#createoption_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Create<wbr>Option</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies how the virtual machine disk should be created. Possible values are <strong>Attach:</strong> This value is used when you are using a specialized disk to create the virtual machine. <strong>FromImage:</strong> This value is used when you are using an image to create the virtual machine data disk. If you are using a platform image, you should also use the imageReference element described above. If you are using a marketplace image, you should also use the plan element previously described. <strong>Empty:</strong> This value is used when creating an empty data disk. <strong>Copy:</strong> This value is used to create a data disk from a snapshot or another disk. <strong>Restore:</strong> This value is used to create a data disk from a disk restore point.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="diskiopsreadwrite_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#diskiopsreadwrite_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Disk<wbr>IOPSRead<wbr>Write</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">double</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the Read-Write IOPS for the managed disk when StorageAccountType is UltraSSD_LRS. Returned only for VirtualMachine ScaleSet VM disks. Can be updated only via updates to the VirtualMachine Scale Set.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="diskmbpsreadwrite_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#diskmbpsreadwrite_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Disk<wbr>MBps<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">double</span>
    </dt>

            title="Required">
        <span id="lun_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#lun_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Lun</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="caching_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#caching_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Caching</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the caching requirements. Possible values are: <strong>None,</strong> <strong>ReadOnly,</strong> <strong>ReadWrite.</strong> The defaulting behavior is: <strong>None for Standard storage. ReadOnly for Premium storage.</strong></dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="deleteoption_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#deleteoption_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Delete<wbr>Option</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies whether data disk should be deleted or detached upon VM deletion. Possible values are: <strong>Delete.</strong> If this value is used, the data disk is deleted when VM is deleted. <strong>Detach.</strong> If this value is used, the data disk is retained after VM is deleted. The default value is set to <strong>Detach</strong>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="detachoption_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#detachoption_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Detach<wbr>Option</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the detach behavior to be used while detaching a disk or which is already in the process of detachment from the virtual machine. Supported values: <strong>ForceDetach.</strong> detachOption: <strong>ForceDetach</strong> is applicable only for managed data disks. If a previous detachment attempt of the data disk did not complete due to an unexpected failure from the virtual machine and the disk is still not released then use force-detach as a last resort option to detach the disk forcibly from the VM. All writes might not have been flushed when using this detach behavior. To force-detach a data disk update toBeDetached to 'true' along with setting detachOption: 'ForceDetach'.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="disksizegb_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#disksizegb_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Disk<wbr>Size<wbr>GB</a>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes. This element can be used to overwrite the size of the disk in a virtual machine image. The property 'diskSizeGB' is the number of bytes x 1024^3 for the disk and the value cannot be larger than 1023.</dd><dt class="property-optional"

    </dt>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The disk name.</dd><dt class="property-optional"

        <span id="sourceresource_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#apientityreferenceresponse">Pulumi.<wbr>Azure<wbr>Native.<wbr>Compute.<wbr>Inputs.<wbr>Api<wbr>Entity<wbr>Reference<wbr>Response</a></span>
    </dt>
